nodes.text: Relentless was a cruiser that was part of the Republic Navy during the Clone Wars.

The Relentless was commanded by Captain Meeba and during the conflict, it was assigned to serve as the flagship of Strike Force Cularin. It flew to the Ando system with the rest of the strike force and participated in a mission to destroy a Confederate base that had been set up there.

The warship later traveled to Coruscant to pick up Osten Dal'Nay, Lanius Qel-Bertuk and Lavina Wren, to take them to the Cularin system. It traveled there as the flagship of a fleet of twelve ships and on arrival in the system, it participated in the Battle of Cularin.
